name: Simple Masternode Coin
description: Simple Masternode Coin (SMNC) is a cryptocurrency blockchain, with an embedded Proof of Stake (POS) and Masternode (MN) functions. Users can contribute to the network in two separate ways. Proof of Stake: 10% of every block reward goes to the stake holders of the project. Individuals that stake will receive a portion of the POS rewards. Masternodes: 90% of every bock reward goes to Masternode holders.
